CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains activity to MOT then leaves the room
MOT and CHI sit opposite each other on the floor playing with a jack+in+the+box that is between the CHIs legs
MOT is speaking in native Ukrainian language
CHI is looking at the jack+in+the+box
MOT set jack+in+the+box upright and turns its handle
CHI watches MOT turning the handle on the jack+in+the+box
CHI watches MOT working the jack+in+the+box
the clown pops out of the jack+in+the+box
CHI grabs the head of the clown in the jack+in+the+box
CHI continues to look at clown while holding its head
MOT makes eye contact with CHI
CHI looks back at the jack+in+the+box still holding onto its head
CHI pulls jack+in+the+box closer to himself examining the clown closely
probably Ukrainian for "what do you have in your mouth ?"
CHI looks back at the jack+in+the+box
CHI lifts the lid to the jack+in+the+box
MOT reaches over and turns the handle on the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks back at the jack+in+the+box still holding its head
CHI pats the clowns head with one hand
CHI ignores MOT and continues to explore clown of jack+in+the+box
CHI tries to close the lid on the jack+in+the+box but the clown is still out
MOT reaches over and pushes the jack+in+the+box into the box and shuts the lid
CHI watches what MOT is doing with jack+in+the+box
CHI tries to open the lid by pulling on it
MOT turns the box so the handle is near the child then turns the handle then points to the handle and taps it
CHI turns box so the top is up and pulls at the lid
CHI still tries to pull lid open
MOT reaches over and grabs the jack+in+the+box to hold it steady and turns the handle
CHI continues to pull at lid with fingers
the clown in the jack+in+the+box pops up
CHI grabs the clown as it pops up
MOT sits back and lets go of the jack+in+the+box
CHI explores the lid of the box and the clown's head
CHI pats on the head of the jack+in+the+box
CHI tries to close the lid on the jack in the box but the clown is in the way
MOT looks around the walls of the room
CHI goes back to exploring the head of clown
Ukrainian for "what do you have in your mouth ?"
MOT squeezes CHIs cheeks to get him to open his mouth
MOT takes something out of CHIs mouth
MOT throws what was in CHI mouth in the garbage
CHI looks back at the jack in the box and examines its head with his hands
CHI continues to look at MOT
MOT turns the handle on the jack+in+the+box causing it to play music which she sings along with
CHI looks at the jack+in+the+box and watches what MOT is doing
MOT stops turning the handle of the jack+in+the+box and leans back and looks at CHI
CHI pats the head of the jack+in+the+box while looking at MOT
MOT lifts the lid of the jack+in+the+box open more
CHI watches what MOT is doing to jack+in+the+box
MOT pushes the jack in the jack+in+the+box back in its box then lets go
CHI grabs the head of the jack+in+the+box and tries to push it into the box
CHI reaches and picks up a toy car laying beside his leg and holds it in front of him with both hands to look at it
CHI continues to explore car with hands and eyes
CHI hits on side of car while holding it in other hand
CHI drops toy by side and grabs head of jack+in+the+box again then looks at MOT
probably Ukrainian for " what is it ?"
CHI looks back at jack+in+the+box and continues to explore its head with his hands
MOT repeats first part of previous question
CHI continues to look at MOT
MOT reaches over and pushes the jack+in+the+box back down
CHI watches MOT push the jack+in+the+box back down
MOT turns the jack+in+the+box so the handle is facing towards the CHI and begins to turn it for him
CHI reaches out and holds the top of the box
MOT lets go of the jack+in+the+box so the child can turn the handle
CHI pulls at the lid with one hand then turns box over and looks for the opening
CHI continues to turn box over and look for a way to get into it
CHI looks back at jack+in+the+box and continues trying to pull its lid open
MOT voice rises to a higher pitch
MOT sits up even straighter nodding her head then leans forward towards the CHI again
CHI looks back at the jack+in+the+box and tries to pull its lid open again
MOT reaches over and picks up the jack+in+the+box and turns it so the top is up and taps the top
CHI holds onto the sides of the box and watches what MOT is doing
MOT lets go of box leaving the child holding it on his leg and sits back
CHI pushes the jack+in+the+box off his leg and continues to try and lift its lid open
CHI looks at MOT then back at the jack+in+the+box
CHI picks up the jack+in+the+box and puts it between his legs then turns it over and lifts it up then sets it back down
MOT raises her eyebrows and leans slightly forward as she asks the questions
INV explains the forbidden object activity
CHI watches INV get object out of drawer and place it on the table
CHI and INV are sitting opposite each other with the object between them
CHI reaches out to touch the object
CHI reaches up and touches the object
MOT sets her arm down on the table next to CHIs unoccupied arm
CHI pulls his hand back from object and continues to look at it intently
MOT touches CHIs hand with her finger then moves her hand away from CHI
CHI looks back up at object . CHI smiles
CHI started to reach toward the object then pulled his hand back
looks back down at table quickly then back up at object
the INV is sitting opposite the CHI with the object between them so it is hard from the angle to tell if the child is only looking at the object or also the INV
CHI lets head follows balls on object
CHI reaches to touches balls with right hand
MOT taps table in front of CHI with fingers of one hand
CHI looks at MOT fingers tapping
CHI pulls back hand that was reaching for object
MOT using one finger taps CHI hand that he is not using to reach object with
INV picks up object and turns to put it back it drawer
CHI watches INV put object away
INV explains parent-child interaction boxes to MOT then leaves the room
CHI is sitting on the floor
takes ball out of the first box and sits down on the floor opposite the CHI
MOT reaches out to CHI and pulls his legs open then rolls the ball towards him
CHI holds ball between his legs on the floor and pats it with one hand
CHI picks up ball and tosses it toward MOT
flaps hands on legs in an excited motion
picks up ball and shakes it in an excited motion
CHI flaps arms up and down patting his legs
MOT rolls ball back towards CHI
CHI picks up ball and tosses it to MOT
CHI touches the rug with one hand
MOT picks up ball and tosses it in the air and catches it
CHI puts his fingers in his mouth
looks like CHI may have picked up something on the rug when he put his hand down
probably Ukrainian for "get that out of your mouth ."
MOT reaches forward towards CHI and pulls his hand out of his mouth
CHI puts his fingers in his mouth again
MOT reaches forward and pull CHIs hand out of his mouth again
CHI puts his fingers back in his mouth
MOT reaches and grabs CHIs hand again
MOT pulls the CHIs hand out of his mouth for the third time
CHI puts his thumb in his mouth
MOT picks up ball and drops it in front of CHI letting it fall
MOT picks up ball to an even higher height and drops it again
MOT rolls ball back towards CHI
CHI takes thumb out of mouth and grabs ball with both hands then picks it up and drops it
MOT picks up ball holds it high and bounces it so that it lands in the CHIs lap
ball bounced off CHIs lap and rolled away from him
MOT rolls ball back towards CHIs lap
MOT rolls ball back towards CHI
CHI grabs ball and hugs it to his chest
CHI picks ball up and bounces it
MOT sits up straight and makes and excited face at CHI
CHI grabs ball and holds it in both hands in front of him
CHI picks up ball and bounces it
ball rolls away from CHI and to the right
CHI looks at rug beside him and picks at it with one hand
CHI looks up at camera and gazes around
CHI puts something in his mouth
<bef> MOT takes box off of table behind her and opens it . MOT takes a blanket out of the box shuts the lid
CHI watches what MOT is doing
MOT puts the box back behind her
MOT scoots closer to CHI and unfolds blanket and holds it up in front of CHIs face
MOT quickly drops blanket so she and CHI can see each other
MOT hands the blanket to CHI
CHI grabs the blanket and pulls it over one leg and behind him
MOT takes blanket from CHI and holds it up in front of herself
CHI looks down at ball between his legs
MOT holds blanket up in front of her face
MOT pulls blanket down to look and see if CHI is watching then pulls it back up so CHI cannot see her
MOT quickly pulls blanket down so CHI can see her
CHI flaps his arms up and down
MOT pulls blanket back up covering her face
CHI looks down at ball between his legs
MOT pulls blanket down and leans towards CHI
MOT shakes blanket up and down in front of CHI
CHI raises ball up to face level under the blanket
MOT pulls blanket down quickly revealing CHI
CHI drops ball rolling it towards MOT
CHI leans forward to get ball back
MOT puts ball back in a box at her side
MOT holds blanket back up in front of CHI
CHI grabs the bottom of the blanket and pulls it to his face
MOT pulls blanket down away from CHIs face
CHI still holding on to blanket pulls it behind him over one leg
MOT repeats the same sentence twice
Ukrainian to the effect of "watch mama play peekaboo ."
MOT pulls blanket up in front of her and hides behind it
CHI looks down towards floor at his side
MOT pulls blanket slightly down and looks to see what CHI is doing
CHI picks something up from rug where he was looking and puts it in his mouth
MOT pulls blanket back up hiding her face
MOT lets go of blanket and takes CHIs hand out of his mouth
CHI puts his hand back in his mouth
MOT pulls CHIs hand back out of his mouth
CHI puts his hand back in his mouth for the third time
MOT tosses the blanket so it covers CHIs head
CHI pulls blanket off his head
leans towards CHI in an excited motion
grabs the blanket and pull it onto her lap
CHI starts picking at rug beside him again
MOT grabs CHIs legs and pulls him closer to her
CHI tries to put his hand in his mouth again
MOT grabs CHIs hand before he gets it in his mouth
MOT lets go of CHIs hand and picks up little pieces of something on the rug beside the CHI
CHI puts his hand back in his mouth
CHI watches MOT picking thing up off the rug
MOT tosses stuff into the garbage
CHI takes hand out of mouth and searches the rug beside him with it
MOT grabs CHIs hand and drags him closer to her
CHI puts hand back in his mouth
MOT tosses blanket over CHIs head
CHI pulls blanket off his head and pulls it behind him
MOT takes another box from behind her and opens it on her lap
MOT sets box beside her and takes a piece of paper and crayons out
MOT takes the blanket from the CHI and sets it aside then MOT places the paper and crayons in front of CHI between his legs
CHI grabs paper and picks it up and looks at it
MOT takes paper back from CHI
MOT sets paper down in front of CHI again and starts to draw with a crayon
MOT hands crayon to CHI takes his hand and helps him draw
CHI stops drawing and holds crayon in his hands looking at it turning it over and over
CHI waves arms up and down excitedly
CHI turns and tries to color on the rug beside him
MOT places her hand on the paper in front of the CHI and taps the paper
MOT reaches into box beside her and pulls out another crayon then holds it out in front of CHI
CHI reaches for crayon takes it in his hand and looks at it
MOT points to paper with both index fingers then pushes the CHIs legs open more so CHI can reach the paper more easily
probably asking the CHI if he wants to color
CHI drops crayon in right hand and transfers the crayon which MOT just handed him from the left to the right hand
CHI shakes crayon up and down while watching it
MOT points to paper and taps it with index finger
CHI continues to explore crayon with hands while looking at it
CHI shakes the crayon up and down again while still looking at it
CHI sets crayon down by his side
MOT picks up crayon and draws on the paper
CHI reaches and takes crayon from MOT and looks at it . <aft> CHI draws on paper with the crayon
CHI waves arms up and down excitedly and looks at MOT
CHI leans over and tries to draw on the rug beside him
CHI sits up and draws on paper again
MOT is folding blanket they had previously used to play peekaboo with
CHI puts crayon in his mouth
MOT takes CHIs hand with the crayon in it away from CHIs mouth
CHI puts crayon back in mouth
MOT takes CHIs hand and crayon out of mouth again
MOT tries to take crayon out of CHIs hand
CHI holds on to crayon so MOT can't take it
MOT pulls crayon out of CHIs hand
CHI puts empty hand back in mouth
MOT pulls CHIs hand out of mouth
MOT wipes something away from CHIs mouth
CHI puts thumbs of both hands in mouth
CHI takes hands out of mouth
CHI looks at MOT and reaches towards MOT with both hands
MOT hands CHI a crayon then takes his hand and helps him draw
MOT reaches behind her and takes a box off the table
MOT sets box in her lap and opens it
end of Crayons and Paper Activity
MOT takes a book out of the box and sets the box aside
MOT puts blanket away in another box and places it on the table behind her
MOT picks up paper from in front of CHI and places it aside
MOT picks up crayons beside CHI and places them aside
leans forward and reaches toward book which is beside MOT
MOT picks up book and sets it in front of CHI
CHI opens book and looks at MOT
MOT picks up box beside her and places it on her lap
CHI picks up book and looks at it
MOT is looking around the room
CHI drops book and grabs hold of it again
MOT puts the lid on the box in her lap
CHI continues to explore book with his hands while looking at it
MOT takes the box off her lap and puts it on the table behind her
CHI is intently exploring book and trying to open it
MOT sets box on her lap again and straightens its lid
MOT opens the book leaving it in front of CHI facing his direction
CHI watches what MOT is doing with book
MOT points to pages of the book as she reads
MOT is reading book for CHI and pointing to the words with her index finger
CHI looks back down at book
CHI watches MOT pointing at book
MOT repeats the same word she just said
MOT sentence seemed to mean "show mommy the xxx ."
CHI points to page where MOT had just pointed
MOT smiles at CHI and makes eye contact
probably Ukrainian for "what does the kitty say ?"
MOT points to book but continues eye contact with CHI
MOT makes an exaggerated face as she imitates a cat
MOT makes an even more exaggerated face and nods her head while meowing
CHI continues to look at MOT and brings a hand up to his mouth
MOT looks at book then back to CHI
CHI leans forward and points to something on the page
MOT leans forward towards CHI again
CHI tries to turn the page then looks up at MOT
MOT uses a high pitched voice
CHI looks back at book and tries to turn the pages again
<bef> MOT takes sharp intake of breath
MOT holds the book so CHI can turn the page
CHI turns the page of the book
MOT points to object on the page
MOT glances away from book at CHI then back down to book
CHI pulls book into his lap and looks at the pages closely
MOT pulls her hands up in the air in a bouncing motions to symbolize jumping
MOT repeats the same sound she just made
MOT repeats the jumping motion with her hands
CHI looks back at book and turns the page
CHI holds book closer to his face and looks intently at the pages
CHI sets book on floor between his legs still looking at pages
CHI pats page of book with one hand
CHI looks away from book towards wall then towards MOT
CHI puts his hand in mouth and plays with his lip
MOT straightens book in front of CHI then turns the book to the next page
CHI watches what MOT is doing with book
MOT points to something on the page of the book
MOT points to the same place in the book again
CHI continues to look at MOT
MOT points to the book and looks at it
CHI looks at book . CHI leans forward and points to the page where the MOT had been pointing
MOT leans back and claps her hands
MOT leans forward towards CHI and smiles at him
CHI waves hands in the air
MOT leans back and claps her hands again while nodding her head
CHI scratches his head with his hands
MOT leans forward and turns the page of the book again
CHI watches what MOT is doing with book
MOT point to something on the book's page
CHI waves arms up and down on legs excitedly
CHI turns the page of the book
CHI picks up book by page
CHI presses on back of book with hands
CHI moves book over to his side
CHI turns the page of the book
CHI picks the book up and looks closely at the open pages
CHI looks away from the book at his own legs then up at MOT
MOT looks at the book in CHIs lap and points to a page and taps it with her index finger
CHI turns the page then looks back up at MOT
CHI looks at door as INV enters
